New Records: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for the most 30+ point games in NBA history
Key Match Events: The Lakers had a 14-2 scoring run in the first quarter
Dalton Knecht made three crucial three-pointers in the second quarter
Others: Anthony Davis dominated with 18 points, 19 rebounds, four assists, three steals, and three blocks
Austin Reaves contributed 20 points, seven rebounds, and six assists
Rui Hachimura added 13 points and eight rebounds
Dalton Knecht provided a spark off the bench with 13 points, including perfect three-point shooting
